biotools.summary: Provides methodology for estimating, inferring, and accounting for population and pedigree structure in genetic analyses. The current implementation provides PC-AiR (Conomos et al., 2015, Gen Epi) and PC-Relate (Conomos et al., 2016, AJHG). PC-AiR performs a PCA on genome-wide SNP data for the detection of population structure in a sample that may contain known or cryptic relatedness. PC-Relate uses ancestry representative principal components to adjust for population structure/ancestry.

bioschemas.name: GENESIS

PC-AiR performs a PCA on genome-wide SNP data for the detection of population structure in a sample that may contain known or cryptic relatedness. PC-Relate uses ancestry representative principal components to adjust for population structure/ancestry.
